title: IntensityCalibrationTool
description: A tool, such as the Meta-Max calibration toold developed by the 4D Nucleome Imaging Standards Working Group, used to perform an intensity calibration procedure.

Name.description: A user defined name for this Intensity Calibration Tool.

Type.description: The type of calibration proceudure this tool is intended to perform.

SerialNumber.description: The serial number of the component

LotNumber.description: The lot number of the component

SpecsFile.description: Attach a PDF file with the specifications for the component as provided by the manufacturer

tier.description: The tier level of this component.
